card.name: Baffling End
card.text: When Baffling End enters the battlefield, exile target creature an opponent controls with converted mana cost 3 or less. When Baffling End leaves the battlefield, target opponent creates a 3/3 green Dinosaur creature token with trample.

card.name: Bishop of Binding
card.text: When Bishop of Binding enters the battlefield, exile target creature an opponent controls until Bishop of Binding leaves the battlefield. Whenever Bishop of Binding attacks, target Vampire gets +X/+X until end of turn, where X is the power of the exiled card.

card.name: Blazing Hope
card.text: Exile target creature with power greater than or equal to your life total.

card.name: Cleansing Ray
card.text: Choose one— • Destroy target Vampire. • Destroy target enchantment.

card.name: Divine Verdict
card.text: Destroy target attacking or blocking creature.

card.name: Everdawn Champion
card.text: Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt to Everdawn Champion.

card.name: Exultant Skymarcher
card.text: Flying

card.name: Famished Paladin
card.text: Famished Paladin doesn't untap during your untap step. Whenever you gain life, untap Famished Paladin.

card.name: Forerunner of the Legion
card.text: When Forerunner of the Legion enters the battlefield, you may search your library for a Vampire card, reveal it, then shuffle your library and put that card on top of it. Whenever another Vampire enters the battlefield under your control, target creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

card.name: Imperial Ceratops
card.text: Enrage—Whenever Imperial Ceratops is dealt damage, you gain 2 life.

card.name: Legion Conquistador
card.text: When Legion Conquistador enters the battlefield, you may search your library for any number of cards named Legion Conquistador, reveal them, put them into your hand, then shuffle your library.

card.name: Luminous Bonds
card.text: Enchant creature Enchanted creature can't attack or block.

card.name: Majestic Heliopterus
card.text: Flying Whenever Majestic Heliopterus attacks, another target Dinosaur you control gains flying until end of turn.

card.name: Martyr of Dusk
card.text: When Martyr of Dusk dies, create a 1/1 white Vampire creature token with lifelink.

card.name: Moment of Triumph
card.text: Target creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn. You gain 2 life.

card.name: Paladin of Atonement
card.text: At the beginning of each upkeep, if you lost life last turn, put a +1/+1 counter on Paladin of Atonement. When Paladin of Atonement dies, you gain life equal to its toughness.

card.name: Pride of Conquerors
card.text: Ascend (If you control ten or more permanents, you get the city's blessing for the rest of the game.) Creatures you control get +1/+1 until end of turn. If you have the city's blessing, those creatures get +2/+2 until end of turn instead.

card.name: Radiant Destiny
card.text: Ascend (If you control ten or more permanents, you get the city's blessing for the rest of the game.) As Radiant Destiny enters the battlefield, choose a creature type. Creatures you control of the chosen type get +1/+1. As long as you have the city's blessing, they also have vigilance.

card.name: Sanguine Glorifier
card.text: When Sanguine Glorifier enters the battlefield, put a +1/+1 counter on another target Vampire you control.

card.name: Skymarcher Aspirant
card.text: Ascend (If you control ten or more permanents, you get the city's blessing for the rest of the game.) Skymarcher Aspirant has flying as long as you have the city's blessing.

card.name: Slaughter the Strong
card.text: Each player chooses any number of creatures he or she controls with total power 4 or less, then sacrifices the rest.

card.name: Snubhorn Sentry
card.text: Ascend (If you control ten or more permanents, you get the city's blessing for the rest of the game.) Snubhorn Sentry gets +3/+0 as long as you have the city's blessing.

card.name: Sphinx's Decree
card.text: Each opponent can't cast instant or sorcery spells during that player's next turn.

card.name: Squire's Devotion
card.text: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +1/+1 and has lifelink. When Squire's Devotion enters the battlefield, create a 1/1 white Vampire creature token with lifelink.

card.name: Sun Sentinel
card.text: Vigilance

card.name: Sun-Crested Pterodon
card.text: Flying Sun-Crested Pterodon has vigilance as long as you control another Dinosaur.

card.name: Temple Altisaur
card.text: If a source would deal damage to another Dinosaur you control, prevent all but 1 of that damage.

card.name: Trapjaw Tyrant
card.text: Enrage—Whenever Trapjaw Tyrant is dealt damage, exile target creature your opponent controls until Trapjaw Tyrant leaves the battlefield.

card.name: Zetalpa, Primal Dawn
card.text: Flying, double strike, vigilance, trample, indestructible

card.name: Admiral's Order
card.text: Raid — If you attacked with a creature this turn, you may pay {U} rather than pay this spell's mana cost. Counter target spell.

card.name: Aquatic Incursion
card.text: When Aquatic Incursion enters the battlefield, create two 1/1 blue Merfolk creature tokens with hexproof. {3}{U}: Target Merfolk can't be blocked this turn.

card.name: Crafty Cutpurse
card.text: Flash When Crafty Cutpurse enters the battlefield, each token that would be created under an opponent's control this turn is created under your control instead.

card.name: Crashing Tide
card.text: Crashing Tide has flash as long as you control a Merfolk. Return target creature to its owner's hand. Draw a card.

card.name: Curious Obsession
card.text: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +1/+1 and has "Whenever this creature deals combat damage to a player, you may draw a card." At the beginning of your end step, if you didn't attack with a creature this turn, sacrifice Curious Obsession.

card.name: Deadeye Rig-Hauler
card.text: Raid—When Deadeye Rig-Hauler enters the battlefield, if you attacked with a creature this turn, you may return target creature to its owner's hand.

card.name: Expel from Orazca
card.text: Ascend (If you control ten or more permanents, you get the city's blessing for the rest of the game.) Return target nonland permanent to its owner's hand. If you have the city's blessing, you may put that permanent on top of its owner's library instead.

card.name: Flood of Recollection
card.text: Return target instant or sorcery card from your graveyard to your hand. Exile Flood of Recollection.

card.name: Hornswoggle
card.text: Counter target creature spell. You create a colorless Treasure artifact token with "{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color to your mana pool."

card.name: Induced Amnesia
card.text: When Induced Amnesia enters the battlefield, target player exiles all cards from his or her hand face down, then draws that many cards. When Induced Amnesia is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, return the exiled cards to their owner's hand.

card.name: Kitesail Corsair
card.text: Kitesail Corsair has flying as long as it's attacking.

card.name: Kumena's Awakening
card.text: Ascend (If you control ten or more permanents, you get the city's blessing for the rest of the game.) At the beginning of your upkeep, each player draws a card. If you have the city's blessing, instead only you draw a card.

card.name: Mist-Cloaked Herald
card.text: Mist-Cloaked Herald can't be blocked.

card.name: Negate
card.text: Counter target noncreature spell.

card.name: Nezahal, Primal Tide
card.text: Nezahal, Primal Tide can't be countered. You have no maximum hand size. Whenever an opponent casts a non creature spell, draw a card. Discard three cards: Exile Nezahal. Return it to the battlefield under its owner's control at the beginning of the next end step.

card.name: Release to the Wind
card.text: Exile target nonland permanent. For as long as that card remains exiled, its owner may cast it without paying its mana cost.

card.name: River Darter
card.text: River Darter can't be blocked by Dinosaurs.

card.name: Riverwise Augur
card.text: When Riverwise Augur enters the battlefield, draw three cards, then put two cards from your hand on top of your library in any order.

card.name: Sailor of Means
card.text: When Sailor of Means enters the battlefield, create a colorless Treasure artifact token with "{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color to your mana pool."

card.name: Sea Legs
card.text: Flash Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +0/+2 as long as it's a Pirate. Otherwise, it gets -2/-0.

card.name: Seafloor Oracle
card.text: Whenever a Merfolk you control deals combat damage to a player, draw a card.

card.name: Secrets of the Golden City
card.text: Ascend (If you control ten or more permanents, you get the city's blessing for the rest of the game.) Draw two cards. If you have the city's blessing, draw three cards instead.

card.name: Silvergill Adept
card.text: As an additional cost to cast Silvergill Adept, reveal a Merfolk card from your hand or pay {3}. When Silvergill Adept enters the battlefield, draw a card.

card.name: Siren Reaver
card.text: Raid—Siren Reaver costs {1} less to cast if you attacked with a creature this turn. Flying

card.name: Slippery Scoundrel
card.text: Ascend (If you control ten or more permanents, you get the city's blessing for the rest of the game.) As long as you havbe the city's blessing, Slippery Scoundrel has hexproof and can't be blocked.

card.name: Soul of the Rapids
card.text: Flying Hexproof (This creature can't be the target of spells or abilities your opponents control.)

card.name: Spire Winder
card.text: Flying Ascend (If you control ten or more permanents, you get the city's blessing for the rest of the game.) Spire Winder gets +1/+1 as long as you have the city's blessing.

card.name: Timestream Navigator
card.text: Ascend (If you control ten or more permanents, you get the city's blessing for the rest of the game.) {2}{U}{U}, {T}, Put Timestream Navigator on the bottom of its owner's library: Take an extra turn after this one. Activate this ability only if you have the city's blessing.

card.name: Warkite Marauder
card.text: Flying Whenever Warkite Marauder attacks, target creature defending player controls loses all abilities and has base power/toughness 0/1 until end of turn.

card.name: Waterknot
card.text: Enchant creature When Waterknot enters the battlefield, tap enchanted creature. Enchanted creature doesn't untap during its controller's untap step.

card.name: Arterial Flow
card.text: Each opponent discards two cards. If you control a Vampire, each opponent loses 2 life and you gain 2 life.

card.name: Champion of Dusk
card.text: When Champion of Dusk enters the battlefield, you draw X cards and you lose X life, where X is the number of Vampires you control.

card.name: Dark Inquiry
card.text: Target opponent reveals his or her hand. You choose a nonland card from it. That player discards that card.

card.name: Dead Man's Chest
card.text: Enchant creature an opponent controls When enchanted creature dies, exile cards equal to its power from the top of its owner's library. You may cast nonland cards from among them for as long as they remain exiled, and you may spend mana as though it were mana of any type to cast those spells.

card.name: Dinosaur Hunter
card.text: Whenever Dinosaur Hunter deals combat damage to a Dinosaur, destroy that creature.

card.name: Dire Fleet Poisoner
card.text: Flash Deathtouch When Dire Fleet Poisoner enters the battlefield, target attacking Pirate you control gets +1/+1 and gains deathtouch until end of turn.

card.name: Dusk Charger
card.text: Ascend (If you control ten or more permanents, you get the city's blessing for the rest of the game.) Dusk Charger gets +2/+2 as long as you have the city's blessing.

card.name: Dusk Legion Zealot
card.text: When Dusk Legion Zealot enters the battlefield, you draw a card and you lose 1 life.

card.name: Fathom Fleet Boarder
card.text: When Fathom Fleet Boarder enters the battlefield, you lose 2 life unless you control another Pirate.

card.name: Forerunner of the Coalition
card.text: When Forerunner of the Coalition enters the battlefield, you may search your library for a Pirate card, reveal it, then shuffle your library and put that card on top of it. Whenever another Pirate enters the battlefield under your control, each opponent loses 1 life.

card.name: Golden Demise
card.text: Ascend (If you control ten or more permanents, you get the city's blessing for the rest of the game.) All creatures get -2/-2 until end of turn. If you have the city's blessing, instead only creatures your opponents control get -2/-2 until end of turn.

card.name: Grasping Scoundrel
card.text: Grasping Scoundrel gets +1/+0 as long as it is attacking.

card.name: Gruesome Fate
card.text: Each opponent loses 1 life for each creature you control.

card.name: Impale
card.text: Destroy target creature.

card.name: Mastermind's Acquisition
card.text: Choose one— • Search your library for a card, put it into your hand, then shuffle your library. • Choose a card you own from outside the game and put it into your hand.

card.name: Mausoleum Harpy
card.text: Flying Ascend (If you control ten or more permanents, you get the city's blessing for the rest of the game.) Whenever another creature you control dies, if you have the city's blessing, put a +1/+1 counter on Mausoleum Harpy.

card.name: Moment of Craving
card.text: Target creature gets -2/-2 until end of turn. You gain 2 life.

card.name: Oathsworn Vampire
card.text: Oathsworn Vampire enters the battlefield tapped. You may cast Oathsworn Vampire from your graveyard if you gained life this turn.

card.name: Pitiless Plunder
card.text: Whenever another creature you control dies, create a colorless Treasure artifact token with "{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color to your mana pool."

card.name: Ravenous Chupacabra
card.text: When Ravenous Chupacabra enters the battlefield, destroy target creature an opponent controls.

card.name: Reaver Ambush
card.text: Exile target creature with power 3 or less.

card.name: Recover
card.text: Return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand. Draw a card.

card.name: Sadistic Skymarcher
card.text: As an additional cost to cast Sadistic Skymarcher, reveal a Vampire card in your hand or pay {1}. Flying, lifelink.

card.name: Tetzimoc, Primal Death
card.text: Deathtouch {B}, Reveal Tetzimoc, Primal Death from your hand: Put a prey counter on target creature. Only activate this ability during your turn. When Tetzimoc enters the battlefield, destroy each creature your opponents control with a prey counter on it.

card.name: Tomb Robber
card.text: Menace {1}, Discard a card: Tomb Robber explores. (Reveal the top card of your library. Put that card into your hand if it's a land. Otherwise, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature, then put the card back or put it into your graveyard.)

card.name: Twilight Prophet
card.text: Flying Ascend (If you control ten or more permanents, you get the city's blessing for the rest of the game.) At the beginning of your upkeep, if you have the city's blessing, reveal the top card of your library and put it into your hand. Each opponent loses X life and you gain X life, where X is that card's converted mana cost.

card.name: Vampire Revenant
card.text: Flying

card.name: Vona's Hunger
card.text: Ascend (If you control ten or more permanents, you get the city's blessing for the rest of the game.) Each opponent sacrifices a creature. If you have the city's blessing, instead each opponent sacrifices half the creatures he or she controls, rounded up.

card.name: Voracious Vampire
card.text: Menace When Voracious Vampire enters the battlefield, target Vampire gets +1/+1 and gains menace until end of turn.

card.name: Blood Sun
card.text: When Blood Sun enters the battlefield, draw a card. All lands lose all abilities except mana abilities.

card.name: Bombard
card.text: Bombard deals 4 damage to target creature.

card.name: Brass's Bounty
card.text: For each land you control, create a colorless Treasure artifact token with "{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color to your mana pool."

card.name: Brazen Freebooter
card.text: When Brazen Freebooter enters the battlefield, create a colorless Treasure artifact token with "{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color to your mana pool."

card.name: Buccaneer's Bravado
card.text: Choose one— • Target creature gets +1/+1 and gains first strike until end of turn. • Target Pirate gets +1/+1 and gains double strike until end of turn.

card.name: Charging Tuskadon
card.text: Trample If Charging Tuskadon would deal combat damage to a player, it deals double that damage to that player instead.

card.name: Daring Buccaneer
card.text: As an additional cost to cast Daring Buccaneer, reveal a Pirate card from your hand or pay {2}.

card.name: Dire Fleet Daredevil
card.text: First Strike When Dire Fleet Daredevil enters the battlefield, exile target instant or sorcery from an opponent's graveyard. You may cast that card this turn, and you may spend mana as though as it were mana of any type to cast that spell. If that card would be put into a graveyard this turn, exile it instead.

card.name: Etali, Primal Storm
card.text: Whenever Etali, Primal Storm attacks, exile the top card of each player's library, then you may cast any number of non land cards exiled this way without paying their mana costs.

card.name: Fanatical Firebrand
card.text: Haste {T}, Sacrifice Fanatical Firebrand: It deals 1 damage to target creature or player.

card.name: Forerunner of the Empire
card.text: When Forerunner of the Empire enters the battlefield, you may search your library for a Dinosaur card, reveal it, then shuffle your library and put that card on top of it. Whenever a Dinosaur enters the battlefield under your control, you may have Forerunner of the Empire deal 1 damage to each creature.

card.name: Form of the Dinosaur
card.text: When Form of the Dinosaur enters the battlefield, your life total becomes 15. At the beginning of your upkeep, Form of the Dinosaur deals 15 damage to target creature an opponent controls and that creature deals damage equal to its power to you.

card.name: Frilled Deathspitter
card.text: Enrage — Whenever Frilled Deathspitter is dealt damage, it deals 2 damage to target opponent.

card.name: Goblin Trailblazer
card.text: Menace

card.name: Mutiny
card.text: Target creature an opponent controls deals damage equal to its power to another target creature that player controls.

card.name: Needletooth Raptor
card.text: Enrage—Whenever Needletooth Raptor is dealt damage, it deals 5 damage to target creature an opponent controls.

card.name: Pirate's Pillage
card.text: As an additional cost to cast Pirate's Pillage, discard a card. Draw two cards and create two colorless Treasure artifact tokens with "{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color to your mana pool."

card.name: Reckless Rage
card.text: Reckless Rage dals 4 damage to target creature you don't control and 2 damage to target creature you control.

card.name: Rekindling Phoenix
card.text: Flying When Rekindling Phoenix dies, create a 0/1 red Elemental creature token with "At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice this creature and return target card named Rekindling Phoenix from your graveyard to the battlefield. It gains haste until end of turn."

card.name: See Red
card.text: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +2/+1 and has first strike. At the beginning of your end step, if you didn't attack with a creature this turn, sacrifice See Red.

card.name: Shake the Foundations
card.text: Shake the Foundations deals 1 damage to each creature without flying. Draw a card.

card.name: Shatter
card.text: Destroy target artifact.

card.name: Silverclad Ferocidon
card.text: Enrage—Whenever Silverclad Ferocidon is dealt damage, each opponent sacrifices a permanent.

card.name: Stampeding Horncrest
card.text: Stampeding Horncrest has haste as long as you control another Dinosaur.

card.name: Storm Fleet Swashbuckler
card.text: Ascend (If you control ten or more permanents, you get the city's blessing for the rest of the game.) Storm Fleet Swashbuckler has double strike as long as you have the city's blessing.

card.name: Sun-Collared Raptor
card.text: Trample {2}{R}: Sun-Collared Raptor gets +3/+0 until end of turn.

card.name: Swaggering Corsair
card.text: Raid — Swaggering Corsair enters the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it if you attacked with a creature this turn.

card.name: Tilonalli's Crown
card.text: Enchant creature When Tilonalli's Crown enters the battlefield, it deals 1 damage to enchanted creature. Enchanted creature gets +3/+0 and has trample.

card.name: Tilonalli's Summoner
card.text: Ascend (If you control ten or more permanents, you get the city's blessing for the rest of the game.) Whenever Tilonalli's Summoner attacks, you may pay {X}{R}. If you do, create X 1/1 red Elemental creature tokens that are tapped and attacking. At the beginning of the next end step, exile those tokens unless you have the City's blessing.

card.name: Aggressive Urge
card.text: Target creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn. Draw a card.

card.name: Cacophodon
card.text: Enrage—Whenever Cacophodon is dealt damage, untap target permanent.

card.name: Cherished Hatchling
card.text: When Cherished Hatchling dies, you may cast Dinosaur spells this turn as though they had flash, and whenever you cast a Dinosaur spell this turn, it gains "When this creature enters the battlefield, you may have it fight another target creature."

card.name: Colossal Dreadmaw
card.text: Trample

card.name: Crested Herdcaller
card.text: Trampler When Crested Herdcaller enters the battlefield, create a 3/3 green Dinosaur creature token with trampler.

card.name: Deeproot Elite
card.text: Whenever another Merfolk enters the battlefield under your control, put a +1/+1 counter on target Merfolk you control.

card.name: Enter the Unknown
card.text: Target creature you control explores. (Reveal the top card of your library. Put that card into your hand if it's a land. Otherwise, put a +1/+1 counter on the creature, then put the card back or put it into your graveyard.) You may play an additional land this turn.

card.name: Forerunner of the Heralds
card.text: When Forerunner of the Heralds enters the battlefield, you may search your library for a Merfolk card, reveal it, then shuffle your library and put that card on top of it. Whenever another Merfolk enters the battlefield under your control, put a +1/+1 counter on Forerunner of the Heralds.

card.name: Ghalta, Primal Hunger
card.text: Ghalta, Primal Hunger costs {X} less to cast, where X is the total power of creatures you control. Trample

card.name: Giltgrove Stalker
card.text: Giltgrove Stalker can't be blocked by creatures with power 2 or less.

card.name: Hardy Veteran
card.text: As long as it's your turn, Hardy Veteran gets +0/+2.

card.name: Hunt the Weak
card.text: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature you control. Then that creature fights target creature you don't control. (Each deals damage equal to its power to the other.)

card.name: Jade Bearer
card.text: When Jade Bearer enters the battlefield, put a +1/+1 counter on another target Merfolk you control.

card.name: Jadecraft Artisan
card.text: When Jadecraft Artisan enters the battlefield, target creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn.

card.name: Jadelight Ranger
card.text: When Jadelight Ranger enters the battlefield, it explores, then it explores again. (Reveal the top card of your library. Put that card into your hand if it's a land. Otherwise, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature, then put the card back or put it into your graveyard. Then repeat this process.)

card.name: Jungleborn Pioneer
card.text: When Jungleborn Pioneer enters the battlefield, create a 1/1 blue Merfolk creature token with hexproof. (It can't be the target of spells or abilities your opponents control.)

card.name: Knight of the Stampede
card.text: Dinosaur spells you cast cost {2} less to cast.

card.name: Naturalize
card.text: Destroy target artifact or enchantment.

card.name: Overgrown Armasaur
card.text: Enrage—Whenever Overgrown Armasaur is dealt damage, create a 1/1 green Saproling creature token.

card.name: Path of Discovery
card.text: Whenever a creature enters the battlefield under your control, it explores. (Reveal the top card of your library. Put that card into your hand if it's a land. Otherwise, put a +1/+1 counter on the creature, then put the card back or put it into your graveyard.)

card.name: Plummet
card.text: Destroy target creature with flying.

card.name: Polyraptor
card.text: Enrage — Whenever Polyraptor is dealt damage, create a token that's a copy of Polyraptor.

card.name: Strength of the Pack
card.text: Put two +1/+1 counters on each creature you control.

card.name: Swift Warden
card.text: Flash When Swift Warden enters the battlefield, target Merfolk you control gains hexproof until end of turn. (It can't be the target of spells or abilities your opponents control.)

card.name: Tendershoot Dryad
card.text: Ascend (If you control ten or more permanents, you get the city's blessing for the rest of the game.) At the beginning of each upkeep, create a 1/1 green Saproling creature token. Saprolings you control get +2/+2 as long as you have the city's blessing.

card.name: Thrashing Brontodon
card.text: {1}, Sacrifice Thrashing Brontodon: Destroy target artifact or enchantment.

card.name: Thunderherd Migration
card.text: As an additional cost to cast Thunderherd Migration, reveal a Dinosaur card for your hand or pay {1}. Search your library for a basic land card, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle your library.

card.name: Wayward Swordtooth
card.text: Ascend (If you control ten or more permanents, you get the city's blessing for the rest of the game.) You may play an additional land on each of your turns. Wayward Swordtooth can't attack or block unless you have the city's blessing.

card.name: World Shaper
card.text: Whenever World Shaper attacks, you may put the top three cards of your library into your graveyard. When World Shaper dies, put all land cards from your graveyard onto the battlefield tapped.

card.name: Angrath, the Flame-Chained
card.text: +1: Each opponent discards a card and loses 2 life. -3: Gain control of target creature until end of turn. Untap it. It gains haste until end of turn. Sacrifice it at the beginning of the next end step if it has converted mana cost 3 or less. -8: Each opponent loses life equal to the number of cards in his or her graveyard.

card.name: Atzocan Seer
card.text: {T}: Add one mana of any color to your mana pool. Sacrifice Atzocan Seer: Return target Dinosaur from your graveyard to your hand.

card.name: Azor, the Lawbringer
card.text: Flying When Azor, the Lawbringer enters the battlefield, each opponent can't cast instant or sorcery spells during that player's next turn. Whenever Azor attacks, you may pay {X}{W}{U}{U}. If you do, you gain X life and draw X cards.

card.name: Deadeye Brawler
card.text: Deathtouch Ascend (If you control ten or more permanents, you get the city's blessing for the rest of the game.) Whenever Deadeye Brawler deals combat damage to a player, if you have the city's blessing, draw a card.

card.name: Dire Fleet Neckbreaker
card.text: Attacking Pirates you control get +2/+0.

card.name: Elenda, the Dusk Rose
card.text: Lifelink Whenever another creature dies, put a +1/+1 counter on Elenda, the Dusk Rose. When Elenda dies, create X 1/1 white Vampire creature tokens with lifelink, where X is Elenda's power.

card.name: Hadana's Climb
card.text: At the beginning of combat on your turn, put a +1/+1 counter on target creature you control. then if that creature has three or more +1/+1 counters on it, transform Hadana's Climb.

card.name: Winged Temple of Orazca
card.text: (Transforms from Hadana's Climb.) {T}: Add one mana of any color to your mana pool. {1}{G}{U}, {T}: Target creature yo ucontrol gains flying and gets +x/+x until end of turn, where X is its power.

card.name: Huatli, Radiant Champion
card.text: +1: Put a loyalty counter on Huatli, Radiant Champion for each creature you control. -1: Target creature gets +X/+X until end of turn, where X is the number of creatures you control. -8: You get an emblem with "Whenever a creature enters the battlefield under your control, you may draw a card.

card.name: Journey to Eternity
card.text: Enchant creature you control When enchanted creature dies, return it to the battlefield under your control, then return Journey to Eternity to the battlefield transformed under your control.

card.name: Atzal, Cave of Eternity
card.text: {T}: Add one mana of any color to your mana pool. {3}{B}{G}, {T}: Return target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield.

card.name: Jungle Creeper
card.text: {3}{B}{G}: Return Jungle Creeper from your graveyard to your hand.

card.name: Kumena, Tyrant of Orazca
card.text: Tap another untapped Merfolk you control: Kumena, Tyrant of Orazca can't be blocked this turn. Tap three untapped Merfolk you control: Draw a card. Tap five untapped Merfolk you control: Put a +1/+1 counter on each Merfolk you control.

card.name: Legion Lieutenant
card.text: Other Vampires you control get +1/+1.

card.name: Merfolk Mistbinder
card.text: Other Merfolk you control get +1/+1.

card.name: Path of Mettle
card.text: When Path of Mettle enters the battlefield, it deals 1 damage to each creature that doesn't have first strike, double strike, vigilance, or haste. Whenever you attack with at least two creatures that have first strike, double strike, vigilance, and/or haste, transform Path of Mettle.

card.name: Metzali, Tower of Triumph
card.text: (Transforms from Path of Mettle.) {T}: Add one mana of any color to your mana pool. {1}{R}, {T}: Metzali, Tower of Triumph deals 2 damage to each opponent. {2}{W}, {T}: Choose a creature at random that attacked this turn. Destroy that creature.

card.name: Profane Procession
card.text: {3}{W}{B}：Exile target creature. Then if there are three or more cards exiled with Profane Procession, transform it.

card.name: Tomb of the Dusk Rose
card.text: (Transforms from Profane Procession.) {T}: Add one mana of any color to your mana pool. {2}{W}{B}, {T}: Put a creature card exiled with this permanent onto the battlefield under your control.

card.name: Protean Raider
card.text: Raid — If you attacked with a creature this turn, you may have Protean Raider enter the battlefield as a copy of any creature on the battlefield.

card.name: Raging Regisaur
card.text: Whenever Raging Regisaur attacks, it deals 1 damage to target creature or player.

card.name: Relentless Raptor
card.text: Vigilance Relentless Raptor attacks or blocks each combat if able.

card.name: Resplendent Griffin
card.text: Flying Ascend (If you control ten or more permanents, you get the city's blessing for the rest of the game.) Whenever Resplendent Griffin attacks, if you have the city's blessing, put a +1/+1 counter on it.

card.name: Siegehorn Ceratops
card.text: Enrage — Whenever Siegehorn Ceratops is dealt damage, put two +1/+1 counters on it. (It must survive the damage to get the counters.)

card.name: Storm Fleet Sprinter
card.text: Haste Storm Fleet Sprinter can't be blocked.

card.name: Storm the Vault
card.text: Whenever one or more creatures you control deal combat damage to a player, create a colorless Treasure artifact token with "{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color to your mana pool." At the beginning of your end step, if you control five or more artifacts, transform Storm the Vault

card.name: Vault of Catlacan
card.text: (Transforms from Storm the Vault.) {T}: Add one mana of any color to your mana pool. {T}: Add {U} to your mana pool for each artifact you control.

card.name: Zacama, Primal Calamity
card.text: Vigilance, reach, trample When Zacama, Primal Calamity enters the battlefield, if you cast it, untap all lands you control. {2}{R}: Zacama deals 3 damage to target creature. {2}{G}: Destroy target artifact or enchantment. {2}{W}: You gain 3 life.

card.name: Awakened Almagam
card.text: Awakened Amalgam's power and toughness is equal to the number of lands you control with different names.

card.name: Azor's Gateway
card.text: {1}, {T}: Draw a card, then exile a card from your hand. If cards with five or more different converted mana costs are exiled with Azor's Gateway, you gain 5 life, untap Azor's Gateway, and transform it.

card.name: Sanctum of the Sun
card.text: (Transforms from Azor's Gateway.) {T}: Add X mana of any one color to your mana pool, where X is your life total.

card.name: Captain's Hook
Gleaming Barrier
card.text: Defender When Gleaming Barrier dies, create a colorless Treasure artifact token with "{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color to your mana pool."

card.name: Golden Guardian
card.text: Defender {2}: Golden Guardian fights another target creature you control. When Golden Guardian dies this turn, return it to the battlefield transformed under your control.

card.name: Gold-Forge Garrison
card.text: (Transforms from Golden Guardian.) {T}: Add two mana of any color to your mana pool. {4}, {T}: Creature a 4/4 colorless Golem artifact creature token.

card.name: The Immortal Sun
card.text: Players can't activate planeswalkers' loyalty abilities. At the beginning of your draw step, draw an additional card. Spells you cast cost {1} less to cast. Creatures you control get +1/+1.

card.name: Orazca Relic
card.text: Ascend (If you control ten or more permanents, you get the city's blessing for the rest of the game.) {T}: Add {C} to your mana pool. {T}, Sacrifice Orazca Relic: You gain 3 life and draw a card. Activate this ability only if you have the city's blessing.

card.name: Silent Gravestone
card.text: Cards in graveyards can't be the targets of spells or abilities. {4}, {T}: Exile Silent Gravestone and all cards from all graveyards. Draw a card.

card.name: Strider Harness
card.text: Equipped creature gets +1/+1 and has haste. Equip {1}

card.name: Traveler's Amulet
card.text: {1}, Sacrifice Traveler's Amulet: Search your library for a basic land card, reveal it, and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your library.

card.name: Arch of Orazca
card.text: Ascend (If you control ten or more permanents, you get the city's blessing for the rest of the game.) {T}: Add {C} to your mana pool. {5}, {T}: Draw a card. Activate this ability only if you have the city's blessing.

card.name: Evolving Wilds
card.text: {T}, Sacrifice Evolving Wilds: Search your library for a basic land card, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle your library.

card.name: Forsaken Sanctuary
card.text: Forsaken Sanctuary enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {W} or {B} to your mana pool.

card.name: Foul Orchard
card.text: Foul Orchard enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {B} or {G} to your mana pool.

card.name: Highland Lake
card.text: Highland Lake enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {U} or {R} to your mana pool.

card.name: Stone Quarry
card.text: Stone Quarry enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {R} or {W} to your mana pool.

card.name: Woodland Stream
card.text: Woodland Stream enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {G} or {U} to your mana pool.

card.name: Plains
card.text: ({T}: Add {W} to your mana pool.)

card.name: Island
card.text: ({T}: Add {U} to your mana pool.)

card.name: Swamp
card.text: ({T}: Add {B} to your mana pool.)

card.name: Mountain
card.text: ({T}: Add {R} to your mana pool.)

card.name: Forest
card.text: ({T}: Add {G} to your mana pool.)

card.name: Vraska, Scheming Gorgon
card.text: +2: Creatures you control get +1/+0 until end of turn. -3: Destroy target creature. -10: Until end of turn, creatures you control gain deathtouch and "Whenever this creature deals damage to an opponent, that player loses the game."

card.name: Vampire Champion
card.text: Deathtouch (Any amount of damage this deals to a creature is enough to destroy it.)

card.name: Vraska's Conquistador
card.text: Whenever Vraska's Conquistador attacks or blocks, if you control a Vraska planes walker, target opponent loses 2 life and you gain 2 life.

card.name: Vraska's Scorn
card.text: Target opponent loses 4 life. You may search your library and/or graveyard for a card named Vraska, Scheming Gorgon, reveal it, and put it into your hand. If you search your library this way, shuffle it.

card.name: Angrath, Minotaur Pirate
card.text: +2: Angrath, Minotaur Pirate deals 1 damage to target opponent and each creature that player controls. -3: Return target Pirate card from your graveyard to the battlefield. -11: Destroy all creatures target opponent controls. Angrath, Minotaur Pirate deals damage to that player equal to their total power.

card.name: Angrath's Ambusher
card.text: Angrath's Ambusher gets +2/+0 as long as you control an Angrath planeswalker.

card.name: Angrath's Fury
card.text: Destroy target creature. Angrath's Fury deals 3 damage to target player. You may search your library and/or graveyard for a card named Angrath, Minotaur Pirate, reveal it, and put it into your hand. If you search your library this way, shuffle it.

card.name: Cinder Barrens
card.text: Cinder Barrens enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {B} or {R} to your mana pool.
